definition: to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
to play with/to wield/to act (cool etc)/to display (a skill, one's temper etc)
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: The mischievous boys blackguarded about the school.
sentences.chinese: 那些頑皮的男孩們在學校裏耍無賴。

definition: to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
lit. to give medicine to a dead horse (idiom)/fig. to keep trying everything in a desperate situation
pinyin: si3 ma3 dang4 huo2 ma3 yi1

definition: not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
making a deer out to be a horse (idiom); deliberate misrepresentation
to defend sb (a relative, friend or oneself) despite knowing that that person is in the wrong
